Early Access Review

Capria is a really fun game for room space VR, so I highly recommend setting up enough room to play it this way.

PROS:
• Fast framerates and absolutely no choppiness in VR. Very comfortable experience.
• Environment looks great.
• Motion controllers are solid once you get the hang of it. Throwing the rocks takes some practice, but once I got it then it became second nature
• Good spatial audio
• The magic particle effects look awesome in VR

CONS:
• I wish the game had some more missions. It looks like the developer is planning this, though.
• I'd like to see the goblins have a hit point system of some sort and they should attack the player.

All in all this is a solid casual game for the Vive and I'll be checking back a lot to see when they add new features.
